rows.title: Path I: FSL - Foundations
rows.description: Build your foundation in French communication for the federal public service. This comprehensive course covers essential grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation for Level A proficiency. Perfect for beginners starting their bilingual journey.
rows.shortDescription: Crash Course in Essential Communication Foundations

rows.title: Path II: FSL - Everyday Fluency
rows.description: Develop your oral communication skills for SLE Level B. Focus on conversation fluency, professional vocabulary, and workplace scenarios. Includes interactive exercises and real-world simulations.
rows.shortDescription: Crash Course in Everyday Workplace Interactions

rows.title: Path III: FSL - Operational French
rows.description: Master written French for the federal workplace. Learn to write professional emails, reports, and briefing notes. Comprehensive grammar review and style guidelines for Level B written proficiency.
rows.shortDescription: Crash Course in Professional Communication for Public Servants
